评论详情: The color is fantastic. The fit was good on me and I love the collar. I don't know if I would call it a sweatshirt or sweater. It looks professional but had the weight and feel of a sweatshirt. Comfy, warm, and cozy and I would love to purchase another one.

评论概述: Comfy, well-made and perfect for fall and winter.
评论详情: I was very pleased with the style, fabric and pretty hot pink color of this sweatshirt. Unfortunately, I ordered a size L and found that it was too oversized and too long for my 125 lb., 5'2 body. I'm planning to order a Medium asap.

This sweater is so cute and comfortable!! The inside is super soft and I’m obsessed with the neckline. The quality is really good and it reminds me of something I would see at Aritzia or Lululemon. I would definitely size up if you want the oversized look. I am usually a s/m and got a large, and it fits perfect!
Heavy, nice fabric and neat neck split detail.  I’ve laundered and it holds up well.It runs large, great to wear over leggings.  Warm.

评论概述: Wanted to like it, but sent back
评论详情: This didn't quite have the same shape on as it did in the photo. The neckline had a notch, which I didn't see in any of the photos.  And the bottom elastic is a bit more snug, which makes it sort of bubble.  I'm tall and slender, but this made me look kind of fat and had an odd puffy fit.  I like the thickness of the fleece, though.  I think this would be really cute if it just had a straight fit, without an elastic at the bottom.  And no notch on the collar.  I ordered 3 sweaters, and really thought I would love this one.  But kept the other and am returning this one.  Looks like other people had better luck with this, though.  With easy returns, it's worth trying if you think you'll like it.

I’m 5’4’’ and 120lbs; I’m a true small and I got a size small. Fits great. Originally, I got the tan one, and I liked it so much that I went back and bought another one in purple. This is NOT one of those deals where you think you are ordering a sweatshirt and end up with a thin, cheap t-shirt material donation bin addition. The material is thick and super soft on both sides. The neck is cozy too—it’s loose enough that it doesn’t feel constricting like a turtle neck. It’s still in the 70-80s where I live so I haven’t had a chance to wear them in public yet, but my yankee husband keeps our house in arctic temperatures so I HAVE worn them around the house, couch rotted, and slept in both of them and have zero complaints. Both have been washed twice on normal cycle in a mixed bag of color clothes with a splash of fabric softener and have not shrunk, worn, raveled or faded. I’m pretty happy with these. It’s difficult to justify buying more of them since I have a million hoodies and sweatshirts, but the green one IS currently sitting in my cart just waiting for my next hormonal online shopping spree 😉

评论概述: The color washes off after spot treatment!
评论详情: The material is fine, although the overall look of the sweatshirt looks cheap, nothing special. My biggest issue was that after wearing it a few times I got a few small stains that did not wash off after doing laundry. I tried to treat the stains again with the "Missy Mouth" spot treatment which always works like a charm (even on my 100% silk skirts), but after rewashing the sweatshirt with the pre-treatment it left these horrible discolorations! That has never happened to my other clothes before, so it seems the material or the dye they use is terrible.

评论概述: Great Quality and Colors - Too Short
评论详情: Love the color, look and quality of material.  However, I am long waisted and this style is too short for me. The pull over half-zip version fits better on my body type.

This is a very nice warm sweatshirt for the price. It is thick and feels high quality. I have it in grey and love the color. I love the high neckline, it adds extra coziness. I’d say it’s true to size but I do wish it was longer!

I love this oversized sweatshirt. I usually wear XS, but I got this in M so it can be extra baggy to pair with leggings. And I love it. The slit on the one side of the collar is odd; I would've liked it better if both sides had a slit, not just one. But overall, I love.
Nice thick sweatshirt. Runs TTS. I have ordered these in 5 different colors. My only complaint is the lighter colors seem to stain easily and it doesn’t wash out very well.

I bought this to wear on a chilly morning to play golf. It was very warm and cute! It wasn’t as long as I was expecting but I still wore it with leggings. I washed and dried on low heat and there was no shrinking.

I really like this sweatshirt however, it isn't as oversized as it looks in the picture.  It's a very good quality sweatshirt, looks nice on, but would have liked it to be roomier.  I'm "busty" and bought a large.  I think an extra-large would have been better.  Keeping it though, very soft.
I like the mock neck look. I wish the material was a bit stretchier. I sized up for a looser fit, and got an XL
Bought it in size S, which is smallest size offered, I’m usually size 2 or XS, this sweater is so big. It’s one thing when it’s oversized, this sweater is just too huge. It fits more like large.

Was nervous to buy because of sizing, I’m 5’6” and about 120! I bought a medium in the gray color and it’s exactly what I was wanting! I think the collar could be a little more structured but it really doesn’t bother me at all. Thinking about grabbing the coffee color as well because I know this will be a basic for me this season! And seems like it’ll be warm too!

Great sweatshirt. I ordered a small and it’s fits great. It’s a thicker material for colder weather. No pockets but still great. I want one in every color! Washed on cold and hung to dry. Didn’t shrink, color held up!
Bonito!
Got a size medium for a slightly oversized fit. I am 5’4” for reference. Fits perfectly oversized and a great basic to have. Got the grey color.
Fits differently.  Cut large at top
Hoping that collar will soften with washing. Sleeves are a little long and slightly larger than expected. Overall a nice top that will get a lot of use.
this is so comfy!! i sized up for a more oversized look! i get soooo many compliments on this!

Soft cozy big but not bulky,  apricot color nicer live than on screen.. got this on sale super good deal
True to size

Love the weight of the fabric. Love the neckline. Ordered my usual size medium. (I'm 5'9" 150 lbs) It fits a tad bit snug but I'm ok with that. Washed in washing machine but hung to dry. Looks great after wash. Deducted one star as the sleeves are too short. Purchased black and I think I'll order another in gray.
Nice but runs small

Love this sweatshirt!! I have had it for a year and it still a favorite. The color coffeegrey is a nice neutral. The neck isn’t restricting but adds warmth as opposed to a standard crew style. Came here to order a second one.
My new favorite sweater. So cute and comfy and very much a dupe

I ordered an XL b/c i love oversized sweaters and hoodies, i thought this was gonna be extremely oversized the way i liked but it came way smaller than i expected, especially for an XL :/. still super cute tho and will be wearing
Nice quality, warm, color was as expected! The only issue is it shrinks a bit. I normally wear a medium but I would recommend sizing up.
I got this pullover a size up but wishing I would have gotten it two sizes up. It fits perfect but because of my long torso I wish it was a little bit bigger. Great quality and wear it all the time.
The color I chose is really perfect it is a great rose color.  The detail in this sweatshirt makes it just a touch special.  It is comfortable and cozy warm.
Looked smaller than I thought but fit great! It was a great gift purchase.
I have got so many compliments on this sweatshirt. Many people think it is from the brand Parke which is like 200$ for the exact same sweatshirt.

Absolutely love the color and will be perfect to keep warm on a cold day without feeling like your wearing something too heavy. The neck seems to give off a bit of a stretched vibe which I’m hoping will be fixed after a wash or two and you definitely should consider going a size up from what you think you are. Amazon recommended a medium and I’m super happy with how the large fits,I think a medium would have definitely been too short in the sleeves and overall length for my personal preference.
This is beautiful but too big Amazon suggested X-Large in 150 always ordered large X-Large is too big very warm only for very cold weather
Ordered this thinking it was a coffee color.  Definitely not as the picture.  Its a brownish cream color.  I do like the fit especially around the neck area.Fits perfectly

I actually do love this. True size. Color is very nice. I have washed it and doesn’t shrink. It’s over size which is awesome. I got size small and fit really well. I weigh 125lbs. Oh my favorite part of this sweater was is not tight on your neck.
Cute and soft but not oversized
Very versatile.  True to size.

评论概述: Color was beautiful and it was very soft
评论详情: The top was very soft and the color was lovely. I returned it as the seams are quite stiff and I didn't realize there was a split seam in the neck. That really bothered me as I'm very sensitive to textures.
I bought these and had my brand added to them. My staff are obsessed with them. Great quality for the price!

True to size, great weight. Love the slit at the neck as it isn’t as tight as a turtleneck and is flattering. It has a thick weight. Length is good and falls below my hips so it works perfect with leggings. Colors are pretty. Highly recommend.

I absolutely love this sweatshirt!  It is so soft, and comfortable. The material definitely has a little thickness to it, so it also keeps you warm. The first time I wore it, I got three compliments. I also like that the neck line is loose, so even though it comes up higher, it does not feel constricting at all. I ordered a medium, and was very pleased with the fit. I can’t recommend this enough!
Granddaughter loves the sweatshirt anf for the price it cannot be matched!!!
Was really impressed with the quality and thickness. Ordered a Med when I’m usually a large and liked the fit with jeans.
Cute sweatshirt, very true to size, for a looser fit, size up.
The picture looked like the shirt and collar were all one piece. The collar is sewn in to the main body. The collar has elastic in top edge. Very nice and great material otherwise.

评论概述: It's not great but it's not terrible
评论详情: Material stuff, even after washing. I sized up and still didn't have an oversized look like the picture. It's not terrible but not my favorite.
Runs smallish but very nice sweat shirt. Love the neck line and comfort
Love the color and fit
best sweater ever
I ordered this one then immediately bought two more in other colors. It’s a comfy sweatshirt but is nice enough to wear to work. Fits true to size.
So comfy and cute but a little too wide for what I like! Still cute and great quality
Color is true to picture - I usually get an XL, however the L fits perfectly. I appreciate when sizing is what is printed.

Love this sweater. It’s athletic chic. Perfect oversized sweater. Sophisticated. I am 5’8 and 185lbs. I am usually an XL In clothes. This is an XL and I definitely could have done a Large and still got the oversized look perfectly. The fabric is soft and comfortable. Love the color and the stitching is done well. It’s a well made product. Highly recommend
Love this sweatshirt, I sized down per the recommendations and it fits great.
Love it, but I wish the fabric e was softer, also faded after the first wash, even though I used baby soap

Fabric is nice feeling, color was just what i wanted, but there is zero stretch and fit was a little off.  Kept it, but passed it on to daughter.
Great value.  Warm and fashionable. True to size. Heavy weight, very good quality. Will buy more.
Looks good, but found it not cut right to raise arms, a bit restrictive, and would have expected the bottom band a bit straighter

When I initially opened the package I didn’t think I liked it or how it looked on me, I was going to return it but decided to steam the wrinkles out and give it another try. Glad I did because I actually love it! Super soft fleece material inside, the color is beautiful, and I love the mock neck detail; gives this sweatshirt a classier look but doesn’t feel like I’m being choked (Im picky about turtle/mock necks bc I hate feeling constricted). It’s more light weight than I expected but still cozy. I sized up to a L in the coffee grey color. Can’t speak to the durability or what will happen to the fleece inside when I wash but I plan to air dry so hopefully material stays soft!
Beautiful quality. Runs big, size Down! Nice medium weight, well made. Highly recommend ❤️‼️

I ordered a large which is my normal size and was pleasantly surprised.at.the fit. My waist is a little bigger than I'd like but the oversized fit hides it well. I bought the green and it is exactly the same color. If you want an oversized fit, but not gigantic order your normal size. If you want it more form fitting go down a size. Also without the lining it has because of the outside material, it would be itchy. Will be ordering more colors.
Quickly becoming a go to! Cute enough to dress up or down while being comfortable and warm.
This is soft and comfortable but it’s not really oversized.

I always read the reviews before buying shoes and clothes.  Reviews were mixed on tthis shirt.  Some declared how soft it was as wel as roomy.  I orderd my usual size and material is very stiff and thick.  Also too small.  Put it on and thought I would never get it off.  Do they use an assortment of materials?  And patterns?  The style is cute and it would certainly be warm.  My daughter can have it for outdoors.
I like this sweatshirt, purchased in green.  It definitely is not as long in the torso as pictured.
I have brought several items from this company. I have always brought small but this one seems to run a little smaller
Love the color, but the sizing is off.

This fits great and I get compliments when wearing it. It looks just as shown. A couple of reviews said the material is shiny and it isn't. I love the neckline. It adds a touch of style and keeps my neck warm on a cold day. Great purchase.

I rarely take the time to write reviews about clothes I buy off amazon, but I do really like this. Lately I’ve had a run of bad luck with sweatshirts being poor quality, boxy, square sleeves, etc. This one is a really nice shape, good quality, good weight and the collar feels a a nice touch.  I’m ordering different colors

I LOVE this top!I’5”7 150 lbs.This is a large.I had a bilateral mastectomy and need tops that camouflage my tummy.The neckline is perfect and I love the little notch on the side. Looks like I’m ordering more🩷

This shirt is thick, comfy, and an overall great purchase! My only regret is I wish I had purchased sooner! I've purchased quite a few of their 1/4 zips but this is my first time purchasing a pullover and I was not disappointed. Quality material and great loose fit - Does not cinch at the waist.

评论概述: Grey Green is more Mint than Sage
评论详情: This is a sturdy sweatshirt with a great design, material, and proportions. I have one in light coffee as well. The only gripe in have is that their colors aren't accurate. I was expecting this to be a more desaturated grey green shade but it turned out to be closer to the green shade variation (like a more vivid mint color). The light coffee variation is also technically on the warmer blush side rather than a true camel.
This is a great sweatshirt to throw on for doing some shopping, going out, or hanging around the house.  The fabric is typically sweatshirt material.

A teeny bit snug in the waist but still able to wear my normal size (Large). I love the neckline--it's a mock neck that isn't tight and constricting yet feels cozy and warm. Sleeves and length are right on. I washed it before wearing and didn't see any shrinking or change in the fabric. It feels soft and is comfortable.
these pullovers are SO soft, they fit really well and are slightly oversized like they look in the picture. I bought 3 different colors, which are also the same color as advertised

This sweatshirt is so soft and cozy, very comfortable. It looks like it could be from Lululemon or Athleta, it's very cute. I love the neckline, and it comes in a variety of cute colors.  Sizing is a little big - I am 5 months pregnant and the small fits me fine.  Overall very cozy - I will probably buy a second one in another color!
Love the item but has shorter sleeves which fits to writs. I like longer and comfy

Love love love the mock neck with little slits. It fits true to size. I like tucking the bottom under so the fact that it’s more cinched there with a band, makes the tuck so easy. Just great every day sweatshirt can dress up or down.
I am 5'4" and 120 lbs and the small was way way too large.  Nice material, but small should be more true to a small person or offer an XS.
Love this sweatshirt; exceeded expectations. I'm 5'6" about 150 lbs and ordered a size small and it fits great.

I think this item might be in the Queen size category and mine's a bit large but even so, it is soft, and comfortable and I like it. The light blue is a lovely shade. ,
